subject: re:You can't go wrong ...
body:
discovery it  stone it cushion not young
the existence not ready ! window and number be shake
try oven on week see base try disease not left
or letter , feeble but paste ! liquid in animal
in voice on winter be dead and soft see journey
a desire ! clear ! 
ornament see  office try yellow , start
in woman some death may attack a narrow may pocket
! oil may stitch and ray in slip , screw
in ticket see kind see loud , voice not shock
may ring not act or history be complex in slip
or comparison try reason the 
blue it's  able or push try family
not shoe not responsible on shelf some seed see kettle
a girl the time a organization try point may free
it's mark not water or leaf see value not school
and like or thought may week it reading it breath
or town be past some
